alert.note: Alert for Barber (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Barber County through 430 PM CDT... At 359 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm very near Hardtner, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kiowa around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hazelton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
